career_bio: Rahman Ahmed is a renowned chef with over 10 years of experience in the culinary industry. She has worked in some of the finest restaurants in Europe and the United States, honing her skills in French, Italian, and Spanish cuisine. Her passion for using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients is evident in her delicious and innovative dishes. Chef Maria's dedication to her craft has earned her numerous awards and accolades throughout her career.
